name: Niniola
description: '''Niniola Apata''' {{Audio|Niniola_Apata.wav|listen}}(born 15 December 1986), known professionally as '''Niniola''', is a [[Nigerians|Nigerian]] singer and songwriter. She participated in the sixth season of ''[[Project Fame West Africa]]'' in 2013 After releasing her debut single "Ibadi", she was nominated for Most Promising Act to Watch at the [[2015 Nigeria Entertainment Awards]].
